Original title: The Lost Weekend
Year: 1945
Duration: 101 min.
Country: United States
Directed by Billy Wilder
Screenplay: Charles Brackett & Billy Wilder (Novel: Charles R. Jackson)
Music: MiklÃƒÂ³s RÃƒÂ³zsa
Photo: John F. Seitz (B & W )
Cast: Ray Milland, Jane Wyman, Phillip Terry, Doris Dowling, Frank Faylen, Howard da Silva, Mary Young, Anita Bolste, Lilian Fontaine, Frank Orth, Audrey Young
Studio: Paramount Pictures
Genre: Drama | Alcoholism

Synopsis:
---------
Don Birnam (Ray Milland) is a failed writer because of his addiction to alcohol, addiction that has destroyed physically and morally and has become a man devoid of will. As long as you keep drinking is capable of anything, even steal. Both his girlfriend (Jane Wyman) and her brother try to regenerate it by all means, but their efforts seem fruitless.
